title.narrative: Saint Lucia Disaster Vulnerability Reduction Project

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is to reduce vulnerability to natural hazards and climate change impacts in Saint Lucia.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :FA, Article V, 5.01, a; LA, Article V, 5.01, a; GA Article V, 5.01 | Description :GoSL to execute the four LegalAgreements: IDA Financing Agreement, PPCR Grant Agreement, SCF Loan Agreement and Project Agreement | Due Date :16-Jul-2014

Finance Agreement :Financing Agreement, Article V, 5.01, b | Description :GoSL to prepare and adopt an Operations Manual forcomponents 1, 2, and 5 in form and substance satisfactory to the World Bank | Due Date :01-Nov-2014

Finance Agreement :Financing Agreement, Article V, 5.01, c | Description :GoSL to establish a Project Coordination Committee withmandate, composition, functions and resources satisfactory to the Association | Due Date :01-Nov-2014

Finance Agreement :Financing Agreement, Schedule 2, Section IV.B.1 (b) | Description :GoSL to prepare and adopt ContingentComponent-specific Operations Manual and defined Action Plan of Activities, in form and substance satisfactory to the World Bank |Due Date :28-Feb-2015

Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement, Article V, 5.01, b | Description :The Subsidiary Agreement has been executed on behalf of theGoSL and the Saint Lucia Development Bank (SLDB) | Due Date :16-Jul-2014

Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement, Schedule 2, Section IV.B.1 (b) | Description :No withdrawal shall be made under Component 3unless and until (i) SLDB has prepared and adopted the CAFF Manual, in form and substance satisfactory to the World Bank; and (ii)implemented the institutional development plan for the CAFF, in a manner acceptable tothe World Bank | Due Date :31-Dec-2014
Furnish a final audit report and a management letter to the Bank, for the period ending March 31, 2019 | Due Date: 15 -Feb- 2020

Timebound Action Plan based on (i) Publication of RAP for Millet Intake and Pipe Rehabilitation activity; (ii) Designs finalizedfor the rehabilitation of the Road Anse-la-Raye to Venus; (iii) Works contract singed for Millet Intake, Highway Section at Micoudand Volet, Road Anse-la-Raye to Venus, and Piaye Bridge; and (iv) Completion of works at Millet Intake and Roblot Community Center.
